item.title: What's New in November 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Last November, we kicked off the Labs team, introduced Salary Advance for the Dwarves, upgraded note.d.foundation, supported Golang meetup, and demonstrated craftsmanship through various case studies and demos.
